EARTH FOR I LORD BRINGETH LAND EGYPT GOD YE SHALL THEREFORE HOLY I HOLY THIS LAW BEASTS FOWL EVERY LIVING CREATURE MOVETH WATERS EVERY CREATURE CREEPETH UPON EARTH TO MAKE DIFFERENCE UNCLEAN CLEAN YE BONDMEN I BROKEN BANDS YOKE MADE GO UPRIGHT BUT YE HEARKEN UNTO COMMANDMENTS AND YE SHALL DESPISE STATUTES SOUL ABHOR JUDGMENTS YE COMMANDMENTS YE BREAK COVENANT I ALSO UNTO I EVEN APPOINT TERROR CONSUMPTION BURNING AGUE SHALL CONSUME EYES CAUSE SORROW HEART YE SHALL SOW SEED VAIN ENEMIES SHALL EAT AND I SET FACE YE SHALL SLAIN ENEMIES HATE SHALL REIGN YE SHALL FLEE NONE PURSUETH AND YE YET HEARKEN UNTO I PUNISH SEVEN TIMES SINS AND I BREAK PRIDE POWER I MAKE HEAVEN IRON EARTH BRASS AND STRENGTH SHALL SPENT VAIN LAND SHALL YIELD INCREASE NEITHER SHALL TREES LAND YIELD FRUITS AND YE WALK CONTRARY UNTO HEARKEN UNTO I BRING SEVEN TIMES PLAGUES UPON ACCORDING SINS I ALSO SEND WILD BEASTS AMONG SHALL ROB CHILDREN DESTROY CATTLE MAKE NUMBER HIGH WAYS SHALL DESOLATE AND YE REFORMED THINGS WALK CONTRARY UNTO THEN I ALSO WALK CONTRARY UNTO PUNISH YET SEVEN TIMES SINS AND I BRING SWORD UPON SHALL AVENGE QUARREL COVENANT YE GATHERED TOGETHER WITHIN CITIES I SEND PESTILENCE AMONG YE SHALL DELIVERED HAND ENEMY AND I BROKEN STAFF BREAD TEN WOMEN SHALL BAKE BREAD ONE OVEN SHALL DELIVER BREAD WEIGHT YE SHALL EAT SATISFIED AND YE HEARKEN UNTO WALK CONTRARY UNTO THEN I WALK CONTRARY UNTO ALSO FURY I EVEN I CHASTISE SEVEN TIMES SINS AND YE SHALL EAT FLESH SONS FLESH DAUGHTERS SHALL YE EAT AND I DESTROY HIGH PLACES CUT IMAGES CAST CARCASES UPON CARCASES IDOLS SOUL SHALL ABHOR AND I MAKE CITIES WASTE BRING SANCTUARIES UNTO DESOLATION I SMELL SAVOUR SWEET ODOURS AND I BRING LAND DESOLATION ENEMIES DWELL THEREIN SHALL ASTONISHED AND I SCATTER AMONG HEATHEN DRAW SWORD LAND SHALL DESOLATE CITIES WASTE THEN SHALL LAND ENJOY SABBATHS LONG LIETH DESOLATE YE ENEMIES LAND EVEN SHALL LAND REST ENJOY SABBATHS AS LONG LIETH DESOLATE SHALL REST REST SABBATHS YE DWELT UPON AND UPON LEFT ALIVE I SEND FAINTNESS HEARTS LANDS ENEMIES SOUND SHAKEN LEAF SHALL CHASE SHALL FLEE FLEEING SWORD SHALL FALL NONE PURSUETH AND SHALL FALL ONE UPON ANOTHER SWORD NONE PURSUETH YE SHALL POWER STAND ENEMIES AND YE SHALL PERISH AMONG HEATHEN LAND ENEMIES SHALL EAT AND LEFT SHALL PINE AWAY INIQUITY ENEMIES LANDS ALSO INIQUITIES FATHERS SHALL PINE AWAY IF SHALL CONFESS INIQUITY INIQUITY FATHERS TRESPASS TRESPASSED ALSO WALKED CONTRARY UNTO AND I ALSO WALKED CONTRARY UNTO BROUGHT LAND ENEMIES UNCIRCUMCISED HEARTS HUMBLED ACCEPT PUNISHMENT INIQUITY THEN I REMEMBER COVENANT JACOB ALSO COVENANT ISAAC UNTO MOSES CHILDREN ISRAEL AND LORD SPAKE UNTO MOSES SAYING SPEAK UNTO CHILDREN ISRAEL WHEN MAN WOMAN SHALL COMMIT SIN MEN COMMIT TRESPASS LORD PERSON GUILTY THEN SHALL CONFESS SIN DONE SHALL RECOMPENSE TRESPASS PRINCIPAL THEREOF ADD UNTO FIFTH PART THEREOF GIVE UNTO HATH TRESPASSED BUT MAN KINSMAN RECOMPENSE TRESPASS UNTO LET TRESPASS RECOMPENSED UNTO LORD EVEN PRIEST BESIDE RAM ATONEMENT WHEREBY ATONEMENT SHALL MADE AND EVERY OFFERING HOLY THINGS CHILDREN ISRAEL BRING UNTO PRIEST SHALL AND EVERY MAN HALLOWED THINGS SHALL WHATSOEVER MAN GIVETH PRIEST SHALL AND LORD SPAKE UNTO MOSES SAYING SPEAK UNTO CHILDREN ISRAEL SAY UNTO IF MAN WIFE GO ASIDE COMMIT TRESPASS AND MAN LIE CARNALLY HID EYES HUSBAND KEPT CLOSE DEFILED WITNESS NEITHER TAKEN MANNER AND SPIRIT JEALOUSY COME UPON JEALOUS WIFE DEFILED SPIRIT JEALOUSY COME UPON JEALOUS WIFE DEFILED THEN SHALL MAN BRING WIFE UNTO PRIEST SHALL BRING OFFERING TENTH PART EPHAH BARLEY MEAL SHALL POUR OIL UPON PUT FRANKINCENSE THEREON OFFERING JEALOUSY OFFERING MEMORIAL BRINGING INIQUITY REMEMBRANCE AND PRIEST SHALL BRING NEAR SET LORD AND PRIEST SHALL TAKE HOLY WATER EARTHEN VESSEL DUST FLOOR TABERNACLE PRIEST SHALL TAKE PUT WATER AND PRIEST SHALL SET WOMAN LORD UNCOVER WOMAN HEAD PUT OFFERING MEMORIAL HANDS JEALOUSY OFFERING PRIEST SHALL HAND BITTER WATER CAUSETH CURSE AND PRIEST SHALL CHARGE OATH SAY UNTO WOMAN IF MAN LAIN THEE THOU HAST GONE ASIDE UNCLEANNESS ANOTHER INSTEAD THY HUSBAND THOU FREE BITTER WATER CAUSETH CURSE BUT THOU HAST GONE ASIDE ANOTHER INSTEAD THY HUSBAND THOU DEFILED MAN LAIN THEE BESIDE THINE HUSBAND THEN PRIEST SHALL CHARGE WOMAN OATH CURSING PRIEST SHALL SAY UNTO WOMAN THE LORD MAKE THEE CURSE OATH AMONG THY PEOPLE LORD DOTH MAKE THY THIGH ROT THY BELLY SWELL AND WATER CAUSETH CURSE SHALL GO THY BOWELS MAKE THY BELLY SWELL THY THIGH ROT AND WOMAN SHALL SAY AMEN AMEN AND PRIEST SHALL WRITE CURSES BOOK SHALL BLOT BITTER WATER AND SHALL CAUSE WOMAN DRINK BITTER WATER CAUSETH CURSE WATER CAUSETH CURSE SHALL ENTER BECOME BITTER THEN PRIEST SHALL TAKE JEALOUSY OFFERING WOMAN HAND SHALL WAVE OFFERING LORD OFFER UPON ALTAR AND PRIEST SHALL TAKE HANDFUL OFFERING EVEN MEMORIAL THEREOF BURN UPON ALTAR AFTERWARD SHALL CAUSE WOMAN DRINK WATER AND HATH MADE DRINK WATER SHALL COME PASS DEFILED DONE TRESPASS HUSBAND WATER CAUSETH CURSE SHALL ENTER BECOME BITTER BELLY SHALL SWELL THIGH SHALL ROT WOMAN SHALL CURSE AMONG PEOPLE AND WOMAN DEFILED CLEAN SHALL FREE SHALL CONCEIVE SEED THIS LAW JEALOUSIES WIFE GOETH ASIDE ANOTHER INSTEAD HUSBAND DEFILED OR SPIRIT JEALOUSY COMETH UPON JEALOUS WIFE SHALL SET WOMAN LORD PRIEST SHALL EXECUTE UPON LAW THEN SHALL MAN GUILTLESS INIQUITY WOMAN SHALL BEAR INIQUITY AND LORD SPAKE UNTO MOSES SAYING SPEAK UNTO CHILDREN ISRAEL SAY UNTO WHEN KINDLED FIRE LORD BURNT AMONG CONSUMED UTTERMOST PARTS CAMP AND PEOPLE CRIED UNTO MOSES MOSES PRAYED UNTO LORD FIRE QUENCHED AND CALLED NAME PLACE TABERAH FIRE LORD BURNT AMONG AND MIXT MULTITUDE AMONG FELL LUSTING CHILDREN ISRAEL ALSO WEPT SAID WHO SHALL GIVE US FLESH EAT WE REMEMBER FISH EAT EGYPT FREELY CUCUMBERS MELONS LEEKS ONIONS GARLICK BUT SOUL DRIED AWAY NOTHING BESIDE MANNA EYES AND MOSES HEARD PEOPLE WEEP THROUGHOUT FAMILIES EVERY MAN DOOR TENT ANGER LORD KINDLED GREATLY MOSES ALSO DISPLEASED AND MOSES SAID UNTO LORD WHEREFORE HAST THOU AFFLICTED THY SERVANT WHEREFORE I FOUND FAVOUR THY SIGHT THOU LAYEST BURDEN PEOPLE UPON HAVE I CONCEIVED PEOPLE I BEGOTTEN THOU SHOULDEST SAY UNTO CARRY THY BOSOM NURSING FATHER BEARETH SUCKING CHILD UNTO LAND THOU SWAREST UNTO FATHERS THY GOD WOULD HEARKEN UNTO BALAAM LORD THY GOD TURNED CURSE BLESSING UNTO THEE LORD THY GOD LOVED THEE THOU SHALT SEEK PEACE PROSPERITY THY DAYS EVER THOU SHALT ABHOR EDOMITE THY BROTHER THOU SHALT ABHOR EGYPTIAN THOU WAST STRANGER LAND THE CHILDREN BEGOTTEN SHALL ENTER CONGREGATION LORD THIRD GENERATION WHEN HOST GOETH FORTH THINE ENEMIES KEEP THEE EVERY WICKED THING IF AMONG MAN CLEAN REASON UNCLEANNESS CHANCETH NIGHT SHALL GO ABROAD CAMP SHALL COME WITHIN CAMP BUT SHALL EVENING COMETH SHALL WASH WATER SUN SHALL COME CAMP THOU SHALT PLACE ALSO WITHOUT CAMP WHITHER THOU SHALT GO FORTH ABROAD AND THOU SHALT PADDLE UPON THY WEAPON SHALL THOU WILT EASE THYSELF ABROAD THOU SHALT DIG THEREWITH SHALT TURN BACK COVER COMETH THEE FOR LORD THY GOD WALKETH MIDST THY CAMP DELIVER THEE GIVE THINE ENEMIES THEE THEREFORE SHALL THY CAMP HOLY SEE UNCLEAN THING THEE TURN AWAY THEE THOU SHALT DELIVER UNTO MASTER SERVANT ESCAPED MASTER UNTO THEE HE SHALL DWELL THEE EVEN AMONG PLACE SHALL CHOOSE PHILISTINES SLEW JONATHAN ABINADAB MALCHISHUA SONS SAUL AND BATTLE WENT SORE SAUL ARCHERS HIT WOUNDED ARCHERS THEN SAID SAUL ARMOURBEARER DRAW THY SWORD THRUST THEREWITH LEST UNCIRCUMCISED COME ABUSE BUT ARMOURBEARER WOULD SORE AFRAID SO SAUL TOOK SWORD FELL UPON AND ARMOURBEARER SAW SAUL DEAD FELL LIKEWISE SWORD DIED SO SAUL DIED THREE SONS HOUSE DIED TOGETHER AND MEN ISRAEL VALLEY SAW FLED SAUL BRANCHES BREATH MOUTH SHALL GO AWAY LET DECEIVED TRUST VANITY VANITY SHALL RECOMPENCE IT SHALL ACCOMPLISHED TIME BRANCH SHALL GREEN HE SHALL SHAKE UNRIPE GRAPE VINE SHALL CAST FLOWER OLIVE FOR CONGREGATION HYPOCRITES SHALL DESOLATE FIRE SHALL CONSUME TABERNACLES BRIBERY THEY CONCEIVE MISCHIEF BRING FORTH VANITY BELLY PREPARETH DECEIT THEN JOB ANSWERED SAID I HEARD MANY THINGS MISERABLE COMFORTERS YE SHALL VAIN WORDS END EMBOLDENETH THEE THOU ANSWEREST I ALSO COULD SPEAK YE SOUL SOUL STEAD I COULD HEAP WORDS SHAKE MINE HEAD BUT I WOULD STRENGTHEN MOUTH MOVING LIPS ASSWAGE GRIEF THOUGH I SPEAK GRIEF ASSWAGED THOUGH I FORBEAR I EASED BUT HATH MADE WEARY THOU HAST MADE DESOLATE COMPANY AND THOU HAST FILLED WRINKLES WITNESS LEANNESS RISING BEARETH WITNESS FACE HE TEARETH WRATH HATETH GNASHETH UPON TEETH MINE ENEMY SHARPENETH EYES UPON THEY GAPED UPON MOUTH SMITTEN UPON CHEEK REPROACHFULLY GATHERED TOGETHER GOD HATH DELIVERED UNGODLY TURNED HANDS WICKED I EASE HATH BROKEN ASUNDER HATH ALSO TAKEN NECK SHAKEN PIECES SET MARK HIS ARCHERS COMPASS ROUND CLEAVETH REINS ASUNDER DOTH SPARE POURETH GALL UPON GROUND HE BREAKETH BREACH UPON BREACH RUNNETH UPON LIKE GIANT I SEWED SACKCLOTH UPON SKIN DEFILED HORN DUST MY FACE FOUL WEEPING EYELIDS SHADOW DEATH NOT INJUSTICE MINE HANDS ALSO PRAYER PURE O EARTH COVER THOU BLOOD LET CRY PLACE ALSO BEHOLD WITNESS HEAVEN RECORD HIGH MY FRIENDS SCORN MINE EYE POURETH TEARS UNTO GOD O ONE MIGHT PLEAD MAN GOD MAN PLEADETH NEIGHBOUR WHEN YEARS COME I SHALL GO WAY WHENCE I SHALL RETURN MY BREATH CORRUPT DAYS EXTINCT GRAVES READY ARE MOCKERS DOTH MINE EYE CONTINUE PROVOCATION LAY PUT SURETY THEE STRIKE HANDS FOR THOU HAST HID HEART UNDERSTANDING THEREFORE SHALT THOU EXALT HE SPEAKETH FLATTERY FRIENDS EVEN EYES CHILDREN SHALL FAIL HE HATH MADE ALSO BYWORD PEOPLE AFORETIME I TABRET MINE EYE ALSO DIM REASON SORROW MEMBERS SHADOW UPRIGHT MEN SHALL ASTONIED INNOCENT SHALL STIR HYPOCRITE THE RIGHTEOUS ALSO SHALL HOLD WAY HATH CLEAN HANDS SHALL STRONGER STRONGER BUT YE RETURN COME I FIND ONE WISE MAN AMONG MY DAYS PAST PURPOSES BROKEN EVEN THOUGHTS HEART THEY CHANGE NIGHT DAY LIGHT SHORT DARKNESS IF I WAIT GRAVE MINE HOUSE I MADE BED DARKNESS I SAID CORRUPTION THOU ART FATHER WORM THOU ART MOTHER SISTER AND HOPE HOPE SHALL SEE THEY SHALL GO BARS PIT REST TOGETHER DUST THEN ANSWERED BILDAD SHUHITE SAID HOW LONG ERE YE MAKE END WORDS MARK AFTERWARDS SPEAK WHEREFORE COUNTED BEASTS REPUTED VILE SIGHT HE TEARETH ANGER SHALL EARTH FORSAKEN THEE SHALL ROCK REMOVED PLACE YEA LIGHT WICKED SHALL PUT SPARK FIRE SHALL SHINE THE LIGHT SHALL DARK TABERNACLE CANDLE SHALL PUT THE STEPS STRENGTH SHALL STRAITENED COUNSEL SHALL CAST FOR CAST NET FEET WALKETH UPON SNARE THE GIN SHALL TAKE HEEL ROBBER SHALL PREVAIL THE SNARE LAID GROUND TRAP WAY TERRORS SHALL MAKE AFRAID EVERY SIDE SHALL DRIVE FEET HIS STRENGTH SHALL HUNGERBITTEN DESTRUCTION SHALL READY SIDE IT SHALL DEVOUR STRENGTH SKIN EVEN FIRSTBORN DEATH SHALL DEVOUR STRENGTH HIS CONFIDENCE SHALL ROOTED TABERNACLE SHALL BRING KING TERRORS IT SHALL DWELL TABERNACLE NONE BRIMSTONE SHALL SCATTERED UPON HABITATION HIS ROOTS SHALL DRIED BENEATH SHALL BRANCH CUT HIS REMEMBRANCE SHALL PERISH EARTH SHALL NAME STREET HE SHALL DRIVEN LIGHT DARKNESS CHASED WORLD HE SHALL NEITHER SON NEPHEW AMONG PEOPLE REMAINING DWELLINGS THEY COME SHALL ASTONIED DAY WENT AFFRIGHTED SURELY DWELLINGS WICKED PLACE KNOWETH GOD THEN JOB ANSWERED SAID HOW LONG YE VEX SOUL BREAK PIECES WORDS THESE TEN TIMES YE REPROACHED YE ASHAMED YE MAKE STRANGE AND INDEED I ERRED MINE ERROR REMAINETH IF INDEED YE MAGNIFY PLEAD REPROACH KNOW GOD HATH OVERTHROWN HATH COMPASSED NET BEHOLD I CRY WRONG I HEARD I CRY ALOUD JUDGMENT HE HATH FENCED WAY I PASS HATH SET DARKNESS PATHS HE HATH STRIPPED GLORY TAKEN CROWN HEAD HE HATH DESTROYED EVERY SIDE I GONE MINE HOPE HATH REMOVED LIKE TREE HE HATH ALSO KINDLED WRATH COUNTETH UNTO ONE ENEMIES HIS TROOPS COME TOGETHER RAISE WAY ENCAMP ROUND TABERNACLE HE HATH PUT BRETHREN FAR MINE ACQUAINTANCE VERILY ESTRANGED MY KINSFOLK FAILED FAMILIAR FRIENDS FORGOTTEN THEY DWELL MINE HOUSE MAIDS COUNT STRANGER I ALIEN SIGHT I CALLED SERVANT GAVE ANSWER I INTREATED MOUTH MY BREATH STRANGE WIFE THOUGH I INTREATED CHILDREN SAKE MINE BODY YEA YOUNG CHILDREN DESPISED I AROSE SPAKE ALL INWARD FRIENDS ABHORRED I LOVED TURNED MY BONE CLEAVETH SKIN FLESH I ESCAPED SKIN TEETH HAVE PITY UPON PITY UPON O YE FRIENDS HAND GOD HATH TOUCHED WHY YE PERSECUTE GOD SATISFIED FLESH OH WORDS WRITTEN OH PRINTED BOOK THAT GRAVEN IRON PEN LEAD ROCK EVER FOR I KNOW REDEEMER LIVETH SHALL STAND LATTER DAY UPON EARTH AND THOUGH SKIN WORMS DESTROY BODY YET FLESH SHALL I SEE GOD WHOM I SHALL SEE MINE EYES SHALL BEHOLD ANOTHER THOUGH REINS CONSUMED WITHIN BUT YE SAY WHY PERSECUTE SEEING ROOT MATTER FOUND BE YE AFRAID SWORD WRATH BRINGETH PUNISHMENTS SWORD YE MAY KNOW JUDGMENT THEN ANSWERED ZOPHAR NAAMATHITE SAID THEREFORE THOUGHTS CAUSE ANSWER I MAKE HASTE I HEARD CHECK REPROACH SPIRIT UNDERSTANDING CAUSETH ANSWER KNOWEST THOU OLD SINCE MAN PLACED UPON EARTH THAT TRIUMPHING WICKED SHORT JOY HYPOCRITE MOMENT THOUGH EXCELLENCY MOUNT HEAVENS HEAD REACH UNTO CLOUDS YET SHALL PERISH EVER LIKE DUNG SEEN SHALL SAY WHERE HE SHALL FLY AWAY DREAM SHALL FOUND YEA SHALL CHASED AWAY VISION NIGHT THE EYE ALSO SAW SHALL SEE NEITHER SHALL PLACE BEHOLD HIS CHILDREN SHALL SEEK PLEASE POOR HANDS SHALL RESTORE GOODS HIS BONES FULL SIN YOUTH SHALL LIE DUST THOUGH WICKEDNESS SWEET MOUTH THOUGH HIDE TONGUE THOUGH SPARE FORSAKE KEEP STILL WITHIN MOUTH YET MEAT BOWELS TURNED GALL ASPS WITHIN HE HATH SWALLOWED RICHES SHALL VOMIT GOD SHALL CAST BELLY HE SHALL SUCK POISON ASPS VIPER TONGUE SHALL SLAY HE SHALL SEE RIVERS FLOODS BROOKS HONEY BUTTER THAT LABOURED SHALL RESTORE SHALL SWALLOW ACCORDING SUBSTANCE SHALL RESTITUTION SHALL REJOICE THEREIN BECAUSE HATH OPPRESSED HATH FORSAKEN POOR HATH VIOLENTLY TAKEN AWAY HOUSE BUILDED SURELY SHALL FEEL QUIETNESS BELLY SHALL SAVE DESIRED THERE SHALL NONE MEAT LEFT THEREFORE SHALL MAN LOOK GOODS IN FULNESS SUFFICIENCY SHALL STRAITS EVERY HAND WICKED SHALL COME UPON WHEN FILL BELLY GOD SHALL CAST FURY WRATH UPON SHALL RAIN UPON EATING HE SHALL FLEE IRON WEAPON BOW STEEL SHALL STRIKE IT DRAWN COMETH BODY YEA GLITTERING SWORD COMETH GALL TERRORS UPON ALL DARKNESS SHALL HID SECRET PLACES FIRE BLOWN SHALL CONSUME SHALL GO ILL LEFT TABERNACLE THE HEAVEN SHALL REVEAL INIQUITY EARTH SHALL RISE THE INCREASE HOUSE SHALL DEPART GOODS SHALL FLOW AWAY DAY WRATH THIS PORTION WICKED MAN GOD HERITAGE APPOINTED UNTO GOD BUT JOB ANSWERED SAID HEAR DILIGENTLY SPEECH LET CONSOLATIONS SUFFER I MAY SPEAK I SPOKEN MOCK AS COMPLAINT MAN SPIRIT TROUBLED MARK ASTONISHED LAY HAND UPON MOUTH EVEN I REMEMBER I AFRAID TREMBLING TAKETH HOLD FLESH WHEREFORE WICKED LIVE BECOME OLD YEA MIGHTY POWER THEIR SEED ESTABLISHED SIGHT OFFSPRING EYES THEIR HOUSES SAFE FEAR NEITHER ROD GOD UPON THEIR BULL GENDERETH FAILETH COW CALVETH CASTETH MIGHT DISPUTE I DELIVERED EVER JUDGE BEHOLD I GO FORWARD BACKWARD I PERCEIVE ON LEFT HAND DOTH WORK I BEHOLD HIDETH RIGHT HAND I SEE BUT KNOWETH WAY I TAKE HATH TRIED I SHALL COME FORTH GOLD MY FOOT SATISFIED THE STRANGER LODGE STREET I OPENED DOORS TRAVELLER IF I COVERED TRANSGRESSIONS ADAM HIDING MINE INIQUITY BOSOM DID I FEAR GREAT MULTITUDE CONTEMPT FAMILIES TERRIFY I KEPT SILENCE WENT DOOR OH ONE WOULD HEAR BEHOLD DESIRE ALMIGHTY WOULD ANSWER MINE ADVERSARY WRITTEN BOOK SURELY I WOULD TAKE UPON SHOULDER BIND CROWN I WOULD DECLARE UNTO NUMBER STEPS PRINCE WOULD I GO NEAR UNTO IF LAND CRY FURROWS LIKEWISE THEREOF COMPLAIN IF I EATEN FRUITS THEREOF WITHOUT MONEY CAUSED OWNERS THEREOF LOSE LIFE LET THISTLES GROW INSTEAD WHEAT COCKLE INSTEAD BARLEY THE WORDS JOB ENDED SO THREE MEN CEASED ANSWER JOB RIGHTEOUS EYES THEN KINDLED WRATH ELIHU SON BARACHEL BUZITE KINDRED RAM JOB WRATH KINDLED JUSTIFIED RATHER GOD ALSO THREE FRIENDS WRATH KINDLED FOUND ANSWER YET CONDEMNED JOB NOW ELIHU WAITED TILL JOB SPOKEN ELDER WHEN ELIHU SAW ANSWER MOUTH THREE MEN WRATH KINDLED AND ELIHU SON BARACHEL BUZITE ANSWERED SAID I YOUNG YE OLD WHEREFORE I AFRAID DURST SHEW MINE OPINION I SAID DAYS SPEAK MULTITUDE YEARS TEACH WISDOM BUT SPIRIT MAN INSPIRATION ALMIGHTY GIVETH UNDERSTANDING GREAT MEN ALWAYS WISE NEITHER AGED UNDERSTAND JUDGMENT THEREFORE I SAID HEARKEN I ALSO SHEW MINE OPINION BEHOLD I WAITED WORDS I GAVE EAR REASONS WHILST YE SEARCHED SAY YEA I ATTENDED UNTO BEHOLD NONE CONVINCED JOB ANSWERED WORDS LEST YE SAY WE FOUND WISDOM GOD THRUSTETH MAN NOW HATH DIRECTED WORDS NEITHER I ANSWER SPEECHES THEY AMAZED ANSWERED LEFT SPEAKING WHEN I WAITED SPAKE STOOD STILL ANSWERED I SAID I ANSWER ALSO PART I ALSO SHEW MINE OPINION FOR I FULL MATTER SPIRIT WITHIN CONSTRAINETH BEHOLD BELLY WINE HATH VENT READY BURST LIKE NEW BOTTLES I SPEAK I MAY REFRESHED I OPEN LIPS ANSWER LET I PRAY ACCEPT MAN PERSON NEITHER LET GIVE FLATTERING TITLES UNTO MAN FOR I KNOW GIVE FLATTERING TITLES MAKER WOULD SOON TAKE AWAY WHEREFORE JOB I PRAY THEE HEAR SPEECHES HEARKEN WORDS BEHOLD I OPENED MOUTH TONGUE HATH SPOKEN MOUTH MY WORDS SHALL UPRIGHTNESS HEART LIPS SHALL UTTER KNOWLEDGE CLEARLY THE SPIRIT PERPETUAL END THOU HAST DESTROYED CITIES MEMORIAL PERISHED BUT LORD SHALL ENDURE EVER HATH PREPARED THRONE JUDGMENT AND SHALL JUDGE WORLD RIGHTEOUSNESS SHALL MINISTER JUDGMENT PEOPLE UPRIGHTNESS THE LORD ALSO REFUGE OPPRESSED REFUGE TIMES TROUBLE AND KNOW THY NAME PUT TRUST THEE THOU LORD HAST FORSAKEN SEEK THEE SING PRAISES LORD DWELLETH ZION DECLARE AMONG PEOPLE DOINGS WHEN MAKETH INQUISITION BLOOD REMEMBERETH FORGETTETH CRY HUMBLE HAVE MERCY UPON O LORD CONSIDER TROUBLE I SUFFER HATE THOU LIFTEST GATES DEATH THAT I MAY SHEW FORTH THY PRAISE GATES DAUGHTER ZION I REJOICE THY SALVATION THE HEATHEN SUNK PIT MADE NET HID FOOT TAKEN THE LORD KNOWN JUDGMENT EXECUTETH WICKED SNARED WORK HANDS HIGGAION SELAH THE WICKED SHALL TURNED HELL NATIONS FORGET GOD FOR NEEDY SHALL ALWAY FORGOTTEN EXPECTATION POOR SHALL PERISH EVER ARISE O LORD LET MAN PREVAIL LET HEATHEN JUDGED THY SIGHT PUT FEAR O LORD NATIONS MAY KNOW MEN SELAH WHY STANDEST THOU AFAR O LORD HIDEST THOU THYSELF TIMES TROUBLE HOLY ONE ISRAEL BY THY SERVANTS HAST THOU REPROACHED LORD HAST SAID BY MULTITUDE CHARIOTS I COME HEIGHT MOUNTAINS SIDES LEBANON I CUT TALL CEDARS THEREOF CHOICE FIR TREES THEREOF I ENTER HEIGHT BORDER FOREST CARMEL I DIGGED DRUNK WATER SOLE FEET I DRIED RIVERS BESIEGED PLACES HAST THOU HEARD LONG AGO I DONE ANCIENT TIMES I FORMED I BROUGHT PASS THOU SHOULDEST LAY WASTE DEFENCED CITIES RUINOUS HEAPS THEREFORE INHABITANTS SMALL POWER DISMAYED CONFOUNDED GRASS FIELD GREEN HERB GRASS HOUSETOPS CORN BLASTED GROWN BUT I KNOW THY ABODE THY GOING THY COMING THY RAGE BECAUSE THY RAGE THY TUMULT COME MINE EARS THEREFORE I PUT HOOK THY NOSE BRIDLE THY LIPS I TURN THEE BACK WAY THOU CAMEST AND SHALL SIGN UNTO THEE YE SHALL EAT YEAR GROWETH SECOND YEAR SPRINGETH THIRD YEAR SOW YE REAP PLANT VINEYARDS EAT O DAUGHTER CHALDEANS THOU SHALT CALLED THE LADY KINGDOMS I WROTH PEOPLE I POLLUTED MINE INHERITANCE GIVEN THINE HAND THOU DIDST SHEW MERCY UPON ANCIENT HAST THOU HEAVILY LAID THY YOKE AND THOU SAIDST I SHALL LADY EVER THOU DIDST LAY THINGS THY HEART NEITHER DIDST REMEMBER LATTER END THEREFORE HEAR THOU ART GIVEN PLEASURES DWELLEST CARELESSLY SAYEST THINE HEART I NONE ELSE BESIDE I SHALL SIT WIDOW NEITHER SHALL I KNOW LOSS CHILDREN BUT TWO THINGS SHALL COME THEE MOMENT ONE DAY LOSS CHILDREN WIDOWHOOD SHALL COME UPON THEE PERFECTION MULTITUDE THY SORCERIES GREAT ABUNDANCE THINE ENCHANTMENTS FOR THOU HAST TRUSTED THY WICKEDNESS THOU HAST SAID NONE SEETH THY WISDOM THY KNOWLEDGE HATH PERVERTED THEE THOU HAST SAID THINE HEART I NONE ELSE BESIDE THEREFORE SHALL EVIL COME UPON THEE THOU SHALT KNOW WHENCE RISETH MISCHIEF SHALL FALL UPON THEE THOU SHALT ABLE PUT DESOLATION SHALL COME UPON THEE SUDDENLY THOU SHALT KNOW STAND THINE ENCHANTMENTS MULTITUDE THY SORCERIES WHEREIN THOU HAST LABOURED THY YOUTH THOU SHALT ABLE PROFIT THOU MAYEST PREVAIL THOU ART WEARIED MULTITUDE THY COUNSELS LET ASTROLOGERS STARGAZERS MONTHLY PROGNOSTICATORS STAND SAVE THEE THINGS SHALL COME UPON THEE BEHOLD SHALL STUBBLE FIRE SHALL BURN SHALL DELIVER POWER FLAME SHALL COAL WARM FIRE SIT THUS SHALL UNTO THEE THOU HAST LABOURED EVEN THY MERCHANTS THY YOUTH SHALL WANDER EVERY ONE QUARTER NONE SHALL THEREFORE THY GATES SHALL OPEN CONTINUALLY SHALL SHUT DAY NIGHT MEN MAY BRING UNTO THEE FORCES GENTILES KINGS MAY BROUGHT FOR NATION KINGDOM SERVE THEE SHALL PERISH YEA NATIONS SHALL UTTERLY WASTED WILT THOU SAY SHALL PUNISH THEE THOU HAST TAUGHT CAPTAINS CHIEF THEE SHALL SORROWS TAKE THEE WOMAN TRAVAIL AND THOU SAY THINE HEART WHEREFORE COME THINGS UPON FOR GREATNESS THINE INIQUITY THY SKIRTS ABOMINATIONS MIDST THEE YE SHALL KNOW I LORD SMITETH BEHOLD DAY BEHOLD COME MORNING GONE FORTH ROD HATH BLOSSOMED PRIDE HATH BUDDED VIOLENCE RISEN ROD WICKEDNESS NONE SHALL REMAIN MULTITUDE NEITHER SHALL WAILING THE TIME COME DAY DRAWETH NEAR LET BUYER REJOICE SELLER MOURN WRATH UPON MULTITUDE THEREOF FOR SELLER SHALL RETURN SOLD ALTHOUGH YET ALIVE VISION TOUCHING WHOLE MULTITUDE THEREOF SHALL RETURN NEITHER SHALL STRENGTHEN INIQUITY LIFE THEY BLOWN TRUMPET EVEN MAKE READY NONE GOETH BATTLE WRATH UPON MULTITUDE THEREOF THE SWORD WITHOUT PESTILENCE FAMINE WITHIN FIELD SHALL DIE SWORD CITY THOU SCORNEST HIRE BUT WIFE COMMITTETH ADULTERY TAKETH STRANGERS INSTEAD HUSBAND THEY GIVE GIFTS WHORES THOU GIVEST THY GIFTS THY LOVERS HIREST MAY COME UNTO THEE EVERY SIDE THY WHOREDOM AND CONTRARY THEE WOMEN THY WHOREDOMS WHEREAS NONE FOLLOWETH THEE COMMIT WHOREDOMS THOU GIVEST REWARD REWARD GIVEN UNTO THEE THEREFORE THOU ART CONTRARY WHEREFORE O HARLOT HEAR WORD LORD THUS SAITH LORD GOD BECAUSE THY FILTHINESS POURED THY NAKEDNESS DISCOVERED THY WHOREDOMS THY LOVERS IDOLS THY ABOMINATIONS BLOOD THY CHILDREN THOU DIDST GIVE UNTO BEHOLD THEREFORE I GATHER THY LOVERS THOU HAST TAKEN PLEASURE THOU HAST LOVED THOU HAST HATED I EVEN GATHER ROUND THEE DISCOVER THY NAKEDNESS UNTO MAY SEE THY NAKEDNESS AND I JUDGE THEE WOMEN BREAK WEDLOCK SHED BLOOD JUDGED I GIVE THEE BLOOD FURY JEALOUSY AND I ALSO GIVE THEE HAND SHALL THROW THINE EMINENT PLACE SHALL BREAK THY HIGH PLACES SHALL STRIP THEE ALSO THY CLOTHES SHALL TAKE THY FAIR JEWELS LEAVE THEE NAKED BARE THEY SHALL ALSO BRING COMPANY THEE SHALL STONE THEE STONES THRUST THEE SWORDS AND SHALL BURN THINE HOUSES FIRE EXECUTE JUDGMENTS UPON THEE SIGHT MANY WOMEN I CAUSE THEE CEASE PLAYING HARLOT THOU ALSO SHALT GIVE HIRE SO I MAKE FURY TOWARD THEE REST JEALOUSY SHALL DEPART THEE I QUIET ANGRY BECAUSE THOU HAST REMEMBERED DAYS THY YOUTH HAST FRETTED THINGS BEHOLD THEREFORE I ALSO RECOMPENSE THY WAY UPON THINE HEAD SAITH LORD GOD THOU SHALT COMMIT LEWDNESS THINE ABOMINATIONS BEHOLD EVERY ONE USETH PROVERBS SHALL USE PROVERB THEE SAYING AS MOTHER DAUGHTER THOU ART THY MOTHER DAUGHTER LOTHETH HUSBAND CHILDREN THOU ART SISTER THY SISTERS LOTHED HUSBANDS CHILDREN MOTHER HITTITE FATHER AMORITE AND THINE ELDER SISTER SAMARIA DAUGHTERS DWELL THY LEFT HAND THY YOUNGER SISTER DWELLETH THY RIGHT HAND SODOM DAUGHTERS YET HAST THOU WALKED WAYS DONE ABOMINATIONS LITTLE THING THOU WAST CORRUPTED THY WAYS AS I LIVE SAITH LORD GOD SODOM THY SISTER HATH DONE DAUGHTERS THOU HAST DONE THOU THY DAUGHTERS BEHOLD INIQUITY THY ALIENATED I BRING THEE EVERY SIDE THE BABYLONIANS CHALDEANS PEKOD SHOA KOA ASSYRIANS DESIRABLE YOUNG MEN CAPTAINS RULERS GREAT LORDS RENOWNED RIDING UPON HORSES AND SHALL COME THEE CHARIOTS WAGONS WHEELS ASSEMBLY PEOPLE SHALL SET THEE BUCKLER SHIELD HELMET ROUND I SET JUDGMENT SHALL JUDGE THEE ACCORDING JUDGMENTS AND I SET JEALOUSY THEE SHALL DEAL FURIOUSLY THEE SHALL TAKE AWAY THY NOSE THINE EARS THY REMNANT SHALL FALL SWORD SHALL TAKE THY SONS THY DAUGHTERS THY RESIDUE SHALL DEVOURED FIRE THEY SHALL ALSO STRIP THEE THY CLOTHES TAKE AWAY THY FAIR JEWELS THUS I MAKE THY LEWDNESS CEASE THEE THY WHOREDOM BROUGHT LAND EGYPT THOU SHALT LIFT THINE EYES UNTO REMEMBER EGYPT FOR THUS SAITH LORD GOD BEHOLD I DELIVER THEE HAND THOU HATEST HAND THY MIND ALIENATED AND SHALL DEAL THEE HATEFULLY SHALL TAKE AWAY THY LABOUR SHALL LEAVE THEE NAKED BARE NAKEDNESS THY WHOREDOMS SHALL DISCOVERED THY LEWDNESS THY WHOREDOMS I THINGS UNTO THEE THOU HAST GONE WHORING HEATHEN THOU ART POLLUTED IDOLS THOU HAST WALKED WAY THY SISTER THEREFORE I GIVE CUP THINE HAND THUS SAITH LORD GOD THOU SHALT DRINK THY SISTER CUP DEEP LARGE THOU SHALT LAUGHED SCORN DERISION CONTAINETH MUCH THOU SHALT FILLED DRUNKENNESS SORROW CUP ASTONISHMENT DESOLATION CUP THY SISTER SAMARIA THOU SHALT EVEN DRINK SUCK THOU SHALT BREAK SHERDS THEREOF PLUCK THINE BREASTS I SPOKEN SAITH LORD GOD THEREFORE THUS SAITH LORD MANNER WOMEN SHED BLOOD ADULTERESSES BLOOD HANDS FOR THUS SAITH LORD GOD I BRING COMPANY UPON GIVE REMOVED SPOILED AND COMPANY SHALL STONE STONES DISPATCH SWORDS SHALL SLAY SONS DAUGHTERS BURN HOUSES THEREFORE SHALT THOU GIVE PRESENTS MORESHETHGATH HOUSES ACHZIB SHALL LIE KINGS ISRAEL YET I BRING HEIR UNTO THEE O INHABITANT MARESHAH SHALL COME UNTO ADULLAM GLORY ISRAEL MAKE THEE BALD POLL THEE THY DELICATE CHILDREN ENLARGE THY BALDNESS EAGLE GONE CAPTIVITY THEE WOE DEVISE INIQUITY WORK EVIL UPON BEDS MORNING LIGHT PRACTISE POWER HAND AND COVET FIELDS TAKE VIOLENCE HOUSES TAKE AWAY OPPRESS MAN HOUSE EVEN MAN HERITAGE THEREFORE THUS SAITH LORD BEHOLD FAMILY I DEVISE EVIL YE SHALL REMOVE NECKS NEITHER SHALL YE GO HAUGHTILY TIME EVIL IN DAY SHALL ONE TAKE PARABLE LAMENT DOLEFUL LAMENTATION SAY WE UTTERLY SPOILED HATH CHANGED PORTION PEOPLE HATH REMOVED TURNING AWAY HATH DIVIDED FIELDS THEREFORE THOU SHALT NONE SHALL CAST CORD LOT CONGREGATION LORD PROPHESY YE SAY PROPHESY SHALL PROPHESY SHALL TAKE SHAME O THOU ART NAMED HOUSE JACOB SPIRIT LORD STRAITENED DOINGS WORDS GOOD WALKETH UPRIGHTLY EVEN LATE PEOPLE RISEN ENEMY YE PULL ROBE GARMENT PASS SECURELY MEN AVERSE WAR THE WOMEN PEOPLE YE CAST PLEASANT HOUSES CHILDREN YE TAKEN AWAY GLORY EVER ARISE YE DEPART REST POLLUTED SHALL DESTROY EVEN SORE DESTRUCTION IF MAN WALKING SPIRIT FALSEHOOD LIE SAYING I PROPHESY UNTO THEE WINE STRONG DRINK SHALL EVEN PROPHET PEOPLE I SURELY ASSEMBLE O JACOB THEE I SURELY GATHER REMNANT ISRAEL I PUT TOGETHER SHEEP BOZRAH FLOCK MIDST FOLD SHALL MAKE GREAT NOISE REASON MULTITUDE MEN THE BREAKER COME BROKEN PASSED GATE GONE KING SHALL PASS LORD HEAD AND I SAID HEAR I PRAY O HEADS JACOB YE PRINCES HOUSE ISRAEL IS KNOW JUDGMENT WHO HATE GOOD LOVE EVIL PLUCK SKIN FLESH BONES WHO ALSO EAT FLESH PEOPLE FLAY SKIN BREAK BONES CHOP PIECES POT FLESH WITHIN CALDRON THEN SHALL CRY UNTO LORD HEAR EVEN HIDE FACE TIME BEHAVED ILL DOINGS THUS SAITH LORD CONCERNING PROPHETS MAKE PEOPLE ERR BITE TEETH CRY PEACE PUTTETH MOUTHS EVEN PREPARE WAR THEREFORE NIGHT SHALL UNTO YE SHALL VISION SHALL DARK UNTO YE SHALL DIVINE SUN SHALL GO PROPHETS DAY SHALL DARK THEN SHALL SEERS ASHAMED DIVINERS CONFOUNDED YEA SHALL COVER LIPS ANSWER GOD BUT TRULY I FULL POWER SPIRIT LORD JUDGMENT MIGHT DECLARE UNTO JACOB TRANSGRESSION ISRAEL SIN HEAR I PRAY YE HEADS HOUSE JACOB PRINCES HOUSE ISRAEL ABHOR JUDGMENT PERVERT EQUITY THEY BUILD ZION BLOOD JERUSALEM INIQUITY THE HEADS THEREOF JUDGE REWARD PRIESTS THEREOF TEACH HIRE PROPHETS THEREOF DIVINE MONEY YET LEAN UPON LORD SAY IS LORD AMONG US NONE EVIL COME UPON US THEREFORE SHALL ZION SAKE PLOWED FIELD JERUSALEM SHALL BECOME HEAPS MOUNTAIN HOUSE HIGH PLACES FOREST BUT LAST DAYS SHALL COME PASS MOUNTAIN HOUSE LORD SHALL ESTABLISHED TOP MOUNTAINS SHALL EXALTED HILLS PEOPLE SHALL FLOW UNTO AND MANY NATIONS SHALL COME SAY COME LET US GO MOUNTAIN LORD HOUSE GOD JACOB TEACH US WAYS WALK PATHS LAW SHALL GO FORTH ZION WORD LORD JERUSALEM AND SHALL JUDGE AMONG ACCUSERS STOOD BROUGHT NONE ACCUSATION THINGS I SUPPOSED BUT CERTAIN QUESTIONS SUPERSTITION ONE JESUS DEAD PAUL AFFIRMED ALIVE AND I DOUBTED MANNER QUESTIONS I ASKED WHETHER WOULD GO JERUSALEM JUDGED
